Purchase and import the following packages to ensure VR Mine full functionality:

BAH - DO NOT DELETE
EasyButtons - https://github.com/madsbangh/EasyButtons
CamelotVFX_Fire&Smoke - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/camelotvfx-fire-smoke-11105
Cross Platform Input - (Unity, deprecated)
geometry3sharp - https://github.com/gradientspace/geometry3Sharp
GoogleMatDesignIcons - https://developers.google.com/fonts/faq
Lens Flares - (???)
MGS-Machinery - https://github.com/mogoson/MGS.Machinery
Skybox - (Legacy Unity skybox, not available on asset store, replace HDRI sky field in the HDRP scene properties)
StandaloneFileBrowser - https://github.com/gkngkc/UnityStandaloneFileBrowser
TextMesh Pro - Legacy, now in Packages
Vehicle - Unity Standard Assets, deprecated. Investigate replacement to restore Vehicle functionality of older VR Mine builds. Not needed for current scenario editor work - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-2018-4-check-out-starter-assets-first-person-thi-32351
